name: BGIRL
description:
STORY:

BGIRL is a COBAYE of the ZERO CORP and she decided to find a way out!But the Zero corp is powerful and won't let her go like this.

Gameplay:

Throught 3 great levels made, she will have to fight the EXAMINATORS which are the security robots. Examinators are a kind of tanks and there is 3 models each one more dangerous than the other.

The controls are revolutions because you have to use the mouse to orient the camera and the following keyboard touch to move: T F G H

So if you have a AZERTY or a QWERTY keyboard there is no adaptation needed.
